name: Project Yume
description:
Project Yume is a solo project where you will utilize input combos to perform powerful skills. The game is currently in prototyping stage. The downloadable build will have you explore and fight through a level filled with droid enemies. The test level has no set end goal as it is only meant to playtest the character's movement and combat abilities. With that said, I would appreciate any feedback on the game's combat system.

===========================================================

Controls

Attack: LMB

Special (Throw Sword/Teleport To Thrown Sword): RMB

Jump: SPACE

Dash: LSHIFT

Return Thrown Sword: E

Combo Starter: E

Heal: Q

Combo Skill Info: ESC or M

===========================================================

Skill Combos

These skills are triggered by performing a series of inputs in quick succession. Note: they require a certain amount of energy to activate.

Whirlwind: E- > LSHIFT -> LMB

Saw Blade: E -> E -> RMB

Thousand Slashes: E -> SPACE -> RMB

Summon (Aerial Droid): E -> SPACE -> E

===========================================================

External Assets

The current level in the game is a slightly modified version of the prebuilt map in the asset pack: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/steampunk-town

Other external assets are included in the file called "ProjectYumeExternalAssets.pdf".
